ctx: intros n ts v s H.
induction ts as [|n' t ts' IH].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros n ts v s H. unfold substituteTerms. induction ts as [|n' t ts' IH]. - reflexivity. - simpl. simpl in H. destruct (Nat.eq_dec v n') as [eq | neq]. + subst. elim H. left. apply in_eq. + apply in_cons. apply IH. intros contra. apply H. right. apply contra.
